summary: The Hookah Clarification Act of 2025 proposes to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to establish a specific tax on waterpipe tobacco. It defines "waterpipe tobacco" to include hookah tobacco, shisha, and similar products. The bill sets a tax rate of $0.5662 per pound for waterpipe tobacco, distinct from the tax on other pipe tobacco. The amendments are slated to take effect for tobacco manufactured or imported after the bill's enactment.
